# quantity

**Type**

The number of purchased consumable products.

## Declaration

```swift
int32 quantity
```

## Product information

- **productId**: The unique identifier of the product.
- **type**: The type of In-App Purchase products you can offer in your app.
- **subscriptionGroupIdentifier**: The identifier of the subscription group that the subscription belongs to.
